content: join me in creating a temperature comforter recording the high temperature of the day each day of the year at the end of the year you will have a queen-sized comforter complete with scalloped edges and fringe what will your year look like the following youtube tutorial is provided as support to get started on this afghan temperature comforter cal 1 i will be using caron simply soft in the following twelve colors - white #9701 less than 0°f - orchid #9719 0-10°f - grape #9610 11-20°f - cobalt blue #9784 21-30°f - cool green #9770 31-40°f - pistachio #0003 41-50°f - sunshine #9755 51-60°f - mango #9605 61-70°f - persimmon #9754 71-80°f - fuchsia #9764 81-90°f - passion #0012 91-100°f - plum perfect #9761 greater than 100°f approximately 35 yds 32 m are needed for each day/row as an option to add a little sparkle hold silver sewing thread together with the yarn on rainy or snowy days there are five different row for the comforter each day is listed with the pattern to use on that day and space provided to record the day s high temperature there is no foundation chain and no weaving in of ends for this pattern this is a free pattern and is written in u s terms 1 https //youtu be/0akel9ttzm8
